channel.title: Error connecting to server
channel.description: If anyone could help I would really appreciate it. The server is up and running people are online but when i try to log in i get error connecting to server. Any ideas or solutions would be greatly appreciated. Server owner can't figure out the problem and I'm trying to assist him in fixing it.

item.title: Error connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

For the host to login the client ip must be set to 127.0.0.1

Read full topic

item.title: Error connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Make sure that you port forwarded and can reach the server. Test if the port is open here:
http://www.yougetsignal.com/tools/open-ports/

If the port is open, then make sure that the client is set to the right server address.

Read full topic
